item.title: It's Log!
item.description: I believe Netflix is allowing us parents to bridge the generational gap like no other resource outside of the church. Here is one of my favorites as a kid and I was able to introduce it today to my kids via Netflix. High five for the interwebs! Do you think it is necessary for dads to try and bridge some of the generational gap with their kids?
